description.value: Primary Energy: Positive 2 (preserving deceased) Supporting Energy: Time 4 (duration 1 hour or until dispelled) Range: Touch Duration: 1 hour (or until dispelled) Total Cost: 6 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Positive Potential + Positive Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Corpse at touch is protected from decay and cannot become undead. Extends time limit for resurrection magic. Saving Throw: None Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 10 minutes, 2 = 1 hour, 3 = 4 hours, 4 = 12 hours, 5 = 1 day
